# Permaculture - Arukone / Nurikabe

This is a Permaculture puzzle - the grid must be divided into two regions of any shape and then a puzzle is solved within each of those regions.

In this case, the two puzzle types are [Arukone](https://puzz.link/rules.html?arukone) and [Nurikabe](https://puzz.link/rules.html?nurikabe).

[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/permaculture1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&a=RVFbDsIwDLvLvvuxLk0fZ0Hc/xr4kQkJ2VbsOgE+n6vfeTXgFC7hFh5il9vldk3iFnbhIwzhECofygfbZMqTJccGtwQrk5FJY9LYrD55fRuvu1vvo2kb+dnW5PFYk3OWXphXhjxOaXCii5rZRE4anJUnZ+XJs/Lk2UuDZ+2dAe3b4m7hxBht5KuqGYPh+0DVimPSL6CqBYN0N9YvtPMngescqDaDuJsq3rfreV9AbW/bdzt2OeBPSbna9lmg7a8LOnZBx+tAx+tAx9UgFeKv+X++Pw==)
